terms.meaning: Distributed ledger technology jo transactions record karta hai.
Digital currency jo cryptography use karta hai.
Self-executing contract with terms directly written into code.
New blocks create karne aur transactions verify karne ka process.
Data ko fixed-size string mein convert karne wala function.
Network participants agreement kaise achieve karte hain.
Central authority ke bina distributed control.
terms.example: No single point of failure in blockchain.

terms.meaning: Cryptocurrency store aur manage karne ka software.
Cryptocurrency access karne ke liye secret key.
Wallet address generate karne ke liye public cryptographic key.
terms.example: Bitcoin address derived from public key.

terms.meaning: Decentralized Finance, traditional finance ka blockchain version.
Non-Fungible Token, unique digital assets.
Blockchain transactions ke liye payment.
terms.example: Ethereum gas fees for smart contract execution.

terms.meaning: Blockchain protocol mein changes ya splits.
Cryptocurrency lock kar ke network security mein participate karna.
DeFi mein trading ke liye cryptocurrency reserves.
terms.example: Uniswap liquidity pools for token swaps.

terms.meaning: DeFi protocols mein rewards earn karne ka method.
Decentralized Autonomous Organization, blockchain-based governance.
Different blockchains ke beech direct cryptocurrency exchange.
Main blockchain ke upar additional scaling solutions.
terms.example: Lightning Network for Bitcoin, Polygon for Ethereum.

terms.meaning: Physical devices ka internet se connected network.
Physical world se data collect karne wala device.
Digital signals ko physical actions mein convert karne wala device.
Data processing device ke paas locally karna.
terms.example: Smart camera mein local image processing.

terms.meaning: IoT devices ko internet se connect karne wala bridge.
Message Queuing Telemetry Transport, IoT communication protocol.
Constrained Application Protocol for IoT devices.
terms.example: Low-power devices ke liye HTTP alternative.

terms.meaning: IoT device mein embedded software.
IoT devices ko remotely update karna.
Physical object ka digital replica.
Devices ka interconnected network without central hub.
terms.example: Zigbee mesh network for smart home.

terms.meaning: Long-range, low-power IoT communication.
Specific task ke liye designed computer system.
Data ko immediately process aur respond karna.
IoT devices ko remotely monitor aur control karna.
Different IoT devices ka ek saath work kar sakna.
terms.example: Smart home devices from different brands.

terms.meaning: Cloud aur edge ke beech intermediate processing.
terms.example: Local data centers for IoT processing.

terms.meaning: Time ke saath collect hone wala sensor data.
IoT data use kar ke equipment failure predict karna.
IoT technology use kar ke city infrastructure optimize karna.
terms.example: Smart traffic lights, waste management systems.
